channel.title: New 317 server help?
channel.description: so im pretty new to java. i wanted to make a little thing in edgeville for me and 1-3 friends. i got a blank client and blank source, so i could just put little things here and there and some npcs as shops. EDIT VV i reorganized what i was looking for help with so if you would like to help it's easier :) 1. shops - below i was told "shops.cfg". i see it, but i don't know what to do with it lol. i do see a shop handler class and java file but i dont know how to edit those so they will be shops. i think i have an idea and i will experiment with it, it could possibly work. --FAILED lol. 2. i have pking, it's in the wildy like normal, but i would like to make it everywhere except edge bank itself. 3. the spawn, i tried using coordinates but for some reason instead of edgeville im in burthope lol. i did double check and mine were right but its still in burthope. 4. is there a way i can put my own commands in? like ::money or ::teletome (name)? i would like commands but i dont know where they go. 5. since im using a blank client, where can i go to edit the background and the login buttons n stuff? im looking but i dont know where. - DONE FEW PROBLEMS 6. im using a blank server so do i have to add ancients and lunar and range? i want them to work (lol) and be able to go from a distance instead of running up to the person. 7. to add to magic, alters would be cool :) 8. how to add items in the correct slots?i have bandos stuff going in the weapon slot with everything else, how do i prevent/fix that? i do know this list is extensive and could take alot work but im willing to learn and take the time to do it. i tried to use blank sources and clients to do most of it myself ( with help) instead of just modifying somebody elses. i dont know if using a blank surce and client is considered leeching and im sorry if it is, but this is as much work as i can do, without making a whole runescape world myself and with the buildings and all. :)

item.title: New 317 server help?
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:11, topic:357015”][quote author=me caveman link=topic=453539.msg3322497#msg3322497 date=1282834097]

http://www.moparisthebest.com/origrs2/

Blank Win.

so is it bad what im using or good?

Well, as I don’t think you have the knowledge to use something much blanker then what you have… Yes it’s a good choice for you. The blank source I posted is for people that actually know what they’re doing… I can’t even use it, I thought I’d post it anyway

is this considered leeching what im doing?
[/quote]
Leeching is taking a server, making about 2 changes, such as home and starting message… Then releasing it or hosting it as your own.[/quote]

oh okay so im pretty far from leeching then im not gonna release it anyways, just for me and a couple friends. thanks for the info, i hear bad things about leechers
Okay, so can somebody please help me with the stuff up above? enough about all the other stuff lol, on task.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

quoting this was a major pain so this is for above lol ^^
umm im not completely sure but they were both winrar archives and the client said “Blank_Client” and the source said “Chosen_Blank” there was pking on it but like no teles or anything. as blank as i can probably find.

item.title: New 317 server help?
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

[quote=“me caveman, post:4, topic:357015”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=453539.msg3321929#msg3321929 date=1282782459]
Shops: (shops.cfg)
Admin: (characters/YOUR_USERNAME.txt) set playerRights == 3
Spawn: (Player.java) look for initial, toX == NUMBER, toY == NUBMER [i]Change the NUMBERs to the coordinates.
[/quote]

very interesting sir, i will look into it, thank you :)[/quote]

where did you find a blank source ? and what thing works? i wanna know ;p

Read full topic

item.title: New 317 server help?
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Shops: (shops.cfg)
Admin: (characters/YOUR_USERNAME.txt) set playerRights == 3
Spawn: (Player.java) look for initial, toX == NUMBER, toY == NUBMER [i]Change the NUMBERs to the coordinates.[/quote]

very interesting sir, i will look into it, thank you

Read full topic

item.title: New 317 server help?
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

abcpker711:

That’s quite abit of work you have going on there. The first thing your going to want to do is exit the Shopmaker file, everything said and done is always done in the Npc.java file, and also in the Objecthandler.java file, if there is a file on a 317 for that… I’ve been working with 569’s but your best bet is to use the .java files, and you’ll find the right things to do in the right area’s. Just click the find button in either “File or Edit” and search Shop/Object/Npc. Hope I was of help.

yes that really did help, i get what you’re saying. im not expecting to do this quickly, just do it eventually so thank you for what you just said

Read full topic

item.title: New 317 server help?
item.dc:creator: @abcpker711 abcpker711
item.description:
@abcpker711 wrote:

That’s quite abit of work you have going on there. The first thing your going to want to do is exit the Shopmaker file, everything said and done is always done in the Npc.java file, and also in the Objecthandler.java file, if there is a file on a 317 for that… I’ve been working with 569’s but your best bet is to use the .java files, and you’ll find the right things to do in the right area’s. Just click the find button in either “File or Edit” and search Shop/Object/Npc. Hope I was of help.

Read full topic

item.title: New 317 server help?
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

so im pretty new to java. i wanted to make a little thing in edgeville for me and 1-3 friends. i got a blank client and blank source, so i could just put little things here and there and some npcs as shops.
EDIT VV
i reorganized what i was looking for help with so if you would like to help it’s easier

  1. shops - below i was told “shops.cfg”. i see it, but i don’t know what to do with it lol. i do see a shop handler class and java file but i dont know how to edit those so they will be shops. i think i have an idea and i will experiment with it, it could possibly work. --FAILED lol.
  2. i have pking, it’s in the wildy like normal, but i would like to make it everywhere except edge bank itself.
  3. the spawn, i tried using coordinates but for some reason instead of edgeville im in burthope lol. i did double check and mine were right but its still in burthope.
  4. is there a way i can put my own commands in? like ::money or ::teletome (name)? i would like commands but i dont know where they go.
  5. since im using a blank client, where can i go to edit the background and the login buttons n stuff? im looking but i dont know where. - DONE FEW PROBLEMS
  6. im using a blank server so do i have to add ancients and lunar and range? i want them to work (lol) and be able to go from a distance instead of running up to the person.
  7. to add to magic, alters would be cool
  8. how to add items in the correct slots?i have bandos stuff going in the weapon slot with everything else, how do i prevent/fix that?
    i do know this list is extensive and could take alot work but im willing to learn and take the time to do it. i tried to use blank sources and clients to do most of it myself ( with help) instead of just modifying somebody elses. i dont know if using a blank surce and client is considered leeching and im sorry if it is, but this is as much work as i can do, without making a whole runescape world myself and with the buildings and all.

Read full topic
